text: Arthur Hadley (5 May 1876–1963) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Leicester Fosse and Notts County. ==References== Category:1876 births Category:1963 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Arnold F.C. players
title: Arthur Hadley (footballer)
